com.cigital.insecurepay.activity

Class HomePageActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cigital.insecurepay.activity.HomePageActivity

  • public class HomePageActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    HomePageActivity is an activity that is the entry point after the user logs in. This activity also acts as a host to Fragments and Navigation Drawer. HomePageActivity extends AppCompatActivity and implements NavigationView.OnNavigationItemSelectedListener and HomeFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      onBackPressed is called when the user presses the hardware back button.
      protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
      onCreate is the first method called when the Activity is being created.

      onCreateOptionsMenu function is called after onCreate and is used to create an options menu in the current activity.
      void onLogOut()
      onLogOut is a function that is called to log the user out.

      onNavigationItemSelected is a function that is called when the user selects one of the items from the navigation drawer.

      onOptionsItemSelected function is called when one of the items in the options overflow menu is selected.

      setAccountDetails is a function that is called to take account details retrieved and pass them as intent to child fragment(s).

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        onCreate is the first method called when the Activity is being created. It populates and initializes the text views.
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - Object that may be used to pass data to this activity while creating it.

      • onBackPressed

        public void onBackPressed()
        onBackPressed is called when the user presses the hardware back button. This function closes the navigation drawer if it is open when back is pressed.

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
        onCreateOptionsMenu function is called after onCreate and is used to create an options menu in the current activity.
        Parameters:
        menu - Contains the options overflow menu.
        Returns:
        boolean Returns true since we are enabling the Options Menu.

      • onOptionsItemSelected

        public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item)
        onOptionsItemSelected function is called when one of the items in the options overflow menu is selected.
        Parameters:
        item - Contains the item that the user selected.

      • onNavigationItemSelected

        public boolean onNavigationItemSelected(MenuItem item)
        onNavigationItemSelected is a function that is called when the user selects one of the items from the navigation drawer.
        Parameters:
        item - Contains the item selected from the navigation drawer.

      • onLogOut

        public void onLogOut()
        onLogOut is a function that is called to log the user out. This function calls the LogoutTask instance to communicate with the server.

      • setAccountDetails

        public void setAccountDetails(AccountVO accountVO)
        setAccountDetails is a function that is called to take account details retrieved and pass them as intent to child fragment(s).
        Parameters:
        accountVO - Contains the account details for the user.
